dict.string: Your iCloud password was incorrect. Please try again.
Your iCloud password cannot be verified at this time.
Some items could not be restored from the iCloud backup.
This iPad hasn’t been backed up in %@ weeks. Backups happen when this iPad is plugged in, locked, and connected to WLAN.
This iPhone hasn’t been backed up in %@ weeks. Backups happen when this iPhone is plugged in, locked, and connected to WLAN.
This iPod touch hasn’t been backed up in %@ weeks. Backups happen when this iPod touch is plugged in, locked, and connected to WLAN.
This iPad hasn’t been backed up in %@ weeks. Backups happen when this iPad is plugged in, locked, and connected to Wi-Fi.
This iPhone hasn’t been backed up in %@ weeks. Backups happen when this iPhone is plugged in, locked, and connected to Wi-Fi.
This iPod touch hasn’t been backed up in %@ weeks. Backups happen when this iPod touch is plugged in, locked, and connected to Wi-Fi.
You can manage your storage in Settings.

This iPad has not been backed up recently because it has not finished being restored. Would you like to finish downloading any remaining purchases and media before backing up, or delete them along with any app data?

This iPhone has not been backed up recently because it has not finished being restored. Would you like to finish downloading any remaining purchases and media before backing up, or delete them along with any app data?

This iPod touch has not been backed up recently because it has not finished being restored. Would you like to finish downloading any remaining purchases and media before backing up, or delete them along with any app data?
iCloud Backup is unable to access the account "%@". Review your account information in Settings.
A Wi-Fi connection is required to download your apps and media.
A WLAN connection is required to download your apps and media.
This iPad hasn't been backed up. Backups happen when this iPad is plugged in, locked, and connected to WLAN.
This iPhone hasn't been backed up. Backups happen when this iPhone is plugged in, locked, and connected to WLAN.
This iPod touch hasn't been backed up. Backups happen when this iPod touch is plugged in, locked, and connected to WLAN.
This iPad hasn't been backed up. Backups happen when this iPad is plugged in, locked, and connected to Wi-Fi.
This iPhone hasn't been backed up. Backups happen when this iPhone is plugged in, locked, and connected to Wi-Fi.
This iPod touch hasn't been backed up. Backups happen when this iPod touch is plugged in, locked, and connected to Wi-Fi.
Your settings have been restored. Connect to power to save battery while apps and media are downloading.
This iPad cannot back up to iCloud without a verified email address.
This iPhone cannot back up to iCloud without a verified email address.
This iPod touch cannot back up to iCloud without a verified email address.
iCloud Backup requires that you verify your password.
